name: Funding options for self-builders (new-build and renovation)
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: This session examines the funding options for self-build projects and asks how the self-builder can ensure that they meet the criteria required by lenders including approvals, standards and warranties. It also discusses the HCA funding for custom build housing for multi-unit schemes.
